name: WebGLRenderingContext.depthMask
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.depthMask() method of the WebGL API sets whether writing into the depth buffer is enabled or disabled.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'depthMask' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.description: The definition of 'glDepthMask' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
